events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund. The product I got is not what I originally purchased.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's statement about receiving the wrong item.
The case was assigned to a customer service agent specialized in processing refund requests.

Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund within 3-5 business days and provide return shipping labels for the incorrect item.

We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
